dict.string: Best sorbitol for chewing gum, best combination of cost, functionality and stability
Crystalline sorbitol with small particle size. 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 2.6kcal/gr (d.b.).

White crystalline powder, free flowing, cryroprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Pleasant cooling effect.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Cost effective, provides desired texture in gum
Liquid solution that contains 70% sorbitol providing bulking and humectancy. 60% sweetness vs. sucrose (d.b.). 2.6kcal/gr (d.b.).
Provides texture and body. Humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Cryoprotectant and freezing point depressant. Non-cariogenic.
Non-hygroscopic nature, Low solubility, Non- reactive, Non- cariogenic, Pleasant cooling effect.
Primarily used as a dusting agent on sugar free chewing gum for moisture prevention. Very low in solubility. 50% sweetness vs. sucrose. 1.6kcal/gr (d.b.).
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Liquid solution that contains 70% sorbitol providing bulking and humectancy. 60% sweetness vs. sucrose (d.b.). 2.6kcal/gr (d.b.).
Provides texture and body. Humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Cryoprotectant and freezing point depressant. Non-cariogenic.
Crystalline sorbitol produced under Ingredion Incorporated’s TrueTrace™ Program for non-GM products.
SORBEX® C200 Crystalline Sorbitol NON-GMO IP

White crystalline powder, free flowing, cryroprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Pleasant cooling effect.
Best crystalline sorbitol for directly compressible tablets. More expensive than SORBOGEM® 1162. Excellent flow property, producing hard tablets at lower compression forces.
Crystalline sorbitol with coarse, uniform (heart cut) particle size distribution, well suited for tableting. 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 2.6kcal/gr (d.b.).

White crystalline powder, free flowing, cryroprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Pleasant cooling effect.
Good performance for directly compressible sorbitol. Less expensive compared to SORBOGEM® 834. Excellent flow properties and compressibility. Excellent flow for high speed presses.
Crystalline sorbitol with coarse particle size distribution, well suited for tableting. 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 2.6kcal/gr (d.b.).

White crystalline powder, free flowing, cryroprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Pleasant cooling effect.
Very compressible with unique particle size and rounded shape. Good flow properties for high speed tableting.
Unique coarse particle size, rounded, porous particle shape, no added binders, free flowing, carrier for flavors, colors, spices, low dusting.
Coarse monohydrate dextose. NF grade available for OTC applications. Would provide similar hardness as UNIDEX® Agglomerated Dextrose, and has an advantage for labeling perspective.
Very compressible with excellent friability with above average hardness. Good flow properties for high speed tableting. Very uniform particle size.
Very uniform, coarse particle size profile, porous, spherical particle shape, free flowing, carrier for flavors, colors, spices, low dusting
Coarse agglomerated dextrose monohydrate with maltodextrin
Very compressible with excellent friability and moderate hardness. Good flow properties for high speed tableting.
Porous, spherical particle shape, free flowing, carrier for flavors, colors, spices, low dusting.
Specially processed coarseagglomerated dextrose monohydrate with maltodextrin
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.

Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. Coarser particle size compared to ENLITEN® 300000. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.

Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. Coarser particle size compared to ENLITEN® 302000. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Coarser particle size compared to MALTISWEET® CM100. Less expensive than MALTISWEET® CM9820.
Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free, reduced sugar applications.

Crystalline maltitol used as bulking agent in various sugar free, reduced sugar applications. 2.1 kcal/g. 90% as sweet as sucrose. Used to directly replace baker's special sugar. Humectant, Soluble in water, Sweetness profile very similar to sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Mainly preferred to be used with stevia for naturally sweetened chocolate. Recommended to be used for partial replacement due to considerable cooling effect.
Can be combined with maltitol or sugar for reduced calorie compound chocolate.

Zero calorie sugar alcohol that is 60-70% as sweet as sucrose. Low in solubility and has a strong cooling effect. Clean sweet taste similar to sucrose. Highest digestive tolerance of all polyols. Low glycemic. Non-browning. Non-cariogenic.
Exceptional purity, minimizes moisture interference, clean, mild sweetness.
High purity, food grade anhydrous dextrose, DE>99.8, free flowing, clean and mild sweetness for economical sugar replacement.
Exceptional purity, minimizes moisture interference, clean, mild sweetness.
CERELOSE® Anhydrous Dextrose M NON-GMO IP
General purpose food grade anhydrous dextrose produced under Ingredion Incorporated’s TrueTrace™ Program for non-GM products.

Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup
(for even better stability can be used in combination with isomalt in hard candy)
Can replace isomalt in sugar-free candies. Cost advantage over MALTISWEET® B and HYSTAR® 5875 Maltitol Syrups. Provides hard candy stability due to high polymer length.

Crystal. control, sweetness, texture, stability. Non-reactive, Functional alternative to corn syrup and/or isomalt, Excellent stabilizing agent, Viscosity aid, Binder, Carrier for flavors and actives.
Need to add HPS for sweetness compensation

Typically a mixture of 15% sorbitol, 20% maltitol, 65% higher molecular weight polyols. 3 kcal/g (d.b.) that imparts high stability and high viscosity. 50% as sweet as sucrose. 2 additional versions available where HPSs are included for added sweetness: HYSTAR® 3375S (with sucralose); HYSTAR® 3375AS (with Ace-K and Sucralose)
Polyglycitol Syrup or Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate

Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup
(for even better stability can be used in combination with isomalt in hard candy)
Higher maltitol content compared to HYSTAR® 3375, so less temperature/relative humidity stability during shelf-life. Higher in sweetness and lower in viscosity compared to HYSTAR® 3375.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 50% maltitol, not more than 8% sorbitol. 50% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).

Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup
(for even better stability can be used in combination with isomalt in hard candy)
Slightly higher maltitol content compared to MALTISWEET® B, so slightly less stable, but more sweet.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 55% maltitol, not more than 8% sorbitol, 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).
Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup when combined with isomalt
Increases viscosity for better processing; provides crystallization control similar to polyglycitol syrups. Increases digestive tolerance. Increases residence time in mouth for lozenges.
Very water soluble, Low sweetness, No cooling effect, Non-reactive, Carrier for sensitive flavors and colors, Binder, Stabilizing aid, Viscosity agent, Dispersability aid, Bulking agent.

STABILITE® SD30 is a polyglycitol in spray-dried form. It is a low sweetness powder that is higher in molecular weight and lower in hygroscopicity than typical polyglycitol products.E21 It can be dissolved in water to produce clear, non-crystallizing syrups at concentrations up to 75%.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Used in making sugar-free soft candy. Cost advantage over MALTISWEET® B and HYSTAR® 5875 Maltitol Syrups.

Crystal. control, sweetness, texture, stability. Non-reactive, Functional alternative to corn syrup and/or isomalt, Excellent stabilizing agent, Viscosity aid, Binder, Carrier for flavors and actives.
Need to add HPS for sweetness compensation
Typically a mixture of 13% sorbitol, 35% maltitol, 52% higher molecular weight polyols. 3 kcal/g (d.b.) that imparts high stability and high viscosity. 50% as sweet as sucrose.
Polyglycitol Syrup or Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Higher maltitol content compared to HYSTAR® 3375, so less temperature/relative humidity stability during shelf-life. Higher in sweetness and lower in viscosity compared to HYSTAR® 3375.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 50% maltitol, not more than 8% sorbitol. 50% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Slightly higher maltitol content compared to MALTISWEET® B, so slightly less stable, but more sweet.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 55% maltitol, not more than 8% sorbitol, 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).

Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Slightly firmer caramel compared to MALTISWEET® 3145.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 50% maltitol, not more than 8% sorbitol. 50% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Slightly softer caramel compared to MALTISWEET® B. More sweetness compared to MALTISWEET® B.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 60% maltitol, not more than 5% sorbitol. 70-80% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Slightly lower maltitol content compared to MALTISWEET® 3145, so slightly more stable, but less sweet.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.

Slightly higher maltitol content compared to HYSTAR® 5875, slightly more sweet.

Coarser particle size compared to MALTISWEET® CM100. Less expensive than MALTISWEET® CM9820.
Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free & reduced sugar applications.

Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free & reduced sugar applications.

Crystalline maltitol used as bulking agent in various sugar free, reduced sugar applications. 2.1 kcal/g. 90% as sweet as sucrose. Used to directly replace baker's special sugar. Humectant, Soluble in water, Sweetness profile very similar to sucrose.
Provides harder texture, simpler processing, reduced production time than sucrose in panning application.
Dry crystalline powder, free flowing, flavor enhancement; non-masking, highly fermentable, high osmolarity, high reducing capacity
High quality, general purpose crystalline monohydrate dextrose, DE>99.5
Dry crystalline powder, free flowing, flavor enhancement; non-masking, highly fermentable, high osmolarity, high reducing capacity
CERELOSE® Dextrose Monohydrate M NON-GMO IP
General purpose crystalline monohydrate dextrose produced under Ingredion Incorporated’s TrueTrace™ Program for non-GM products.
Coarser particle size compared to MALTISWEET® CM100. Less expensive than MALTISWEET® CM9820.
Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free & reduced sugar applications.

Crystalline maltitol used as bulking agent in various sugar free, reduced sugar applications. 2.1 kcal/g. 90% as sweet as sucrose. Used to directly replace baker's special sugar. Humectant, Soluble in water, Sweetness profile very similar to sucrose.
Finer particle size compared to MALTISWEET® CM40. Because of smaller particle size, provides a smooth, less gritty mouthfeel.
Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free & reduced sugar applications.

Crystalline maltitol used as bulking agent in various sugar free, reduced sugar applications. 2.1 kcal/g. 90% as sweet as sucrose. Used to replace powdered sugar. Humectant, Soluble in water, Sweetness profile very similar to sucrose.
Small particle size for a smooth, less gritty mouthfeel.
Crystalline sorbitol with very fine particle size distribution. 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 2.6kcal/gr (d.b.).

White crystalline powder, free flowing, cryroprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Pleasant cooling effect.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 95% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering.
Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup or high maltose corn syrup
Specific IMO product for hard candy application.
Mild taste & mouthfeel improvement. Low hygroscopicity. Process stability. Oligosaccharide labeling.

Isomalto-oligosaccharide for sugar replacement. Low sweetness (25% of sucrose). Has low sugar (mono- and di-saccharide) content < 18% (d.b.). Prebiotic functionality. IMO ~ 14% (d.b.). pH/heat stable.
Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup when combined with isomalt
Increases viscosity for better processing; provides crystallization control similar to polyglycitol syrups. Increases digestive tolerance. Increases residence time in mouth for lozenges.
Very water soluble, Low sweetness, No cooling effect, Non-reactive, Carrier for sensitive flavors and colors, Binder, Stabilizing aid, Viscosity agent, Dispersability aid, Bulking agent.

STABILITE® SD30 is a polyglycitol in spray-dried form. It is a low sweetness powder that is higher in molecular weight and lower in hygroscopicity than typical polyglycitol products.E21 It can be dissolved in water to produce clear, non-crystallizing syrups at concentrations up to 75%.

Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup
(for even better stability can be used in combination with isomalt in hard candy)
Can replace isomalt in sugar-free candies. Cost advantage over MALTISWEET® B and HYSTAR® 5875 Maltitol Syrups. Provides hard candy stability due to high polymer length.

Crystal. control, sweetness, texture, stability. Non-reactive, Functional alternative to corn syrup and/or isomalt, Excellent stabilizing agent, Viscosity aid, Binder, Carrier for flavors and actives.
Need to add HPS for sweetness compensation

Typically a mixture of 15% sorbitol, 20% maltitol, 65% higher molecular weight polyols. 3 kcal/g (d.b.) that imparts high stability and high viscosity. 50% as sweet as sucrose. 2 additional versions available where HPSs are included for added sweetness: HYSTAR® 3375S (with sucralose); HYSTAR® 3375AS (with Ace-K and Sucralose)
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup or high maltose corn syrup
Specific IMO product for soft candy application.
Mild taste & mouthfeel improvement. Low hygroscopicity. Process stability. Oligosaccharide labeling.

Isomalto-oligosaccharide for sugar replacement. Low sweetness (35% of sucrose). Has low sugar (mono- and di-saccharide) content < 30% (d.b.). Prebiotic functionality. IMO ~ 15% (d.b.). pH/heat stable.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Used for rheology and texture improvement. Provides extra chewiness and firmer texture.
Glucose syrup plus dextrose syrup to replace common glucose syrup. Used for rheology and texture improvement.
Up to 100% replacement of corn syrup
Used in making sugar-free hard candy. Can replace isomalt in sugar-free candies. Provides hard candy stability due to high polymer length.

Crystal. control, sweetness, texture, stability. Non-reactive, Functional alternative to corn syrup and/or isomalt, Excellent stabilizing agent, Viscosity aid, Binder, Carrier for flavors and actives.

Non-crystallizing, Humectant, Texturizing agent, Stabilizing aid, Non-reactive, Non-cariogenic, Sweetness and taste similar to sugar, Replacement for sugar and corn syrup.
Maltitol syrups typically replace medium and high DE corn syrups in sugar free and reduced sugar confections due to the balance of small and large molecular weight material.
Maltitol syrup containing maltitol, sorbitol and high molecular weight polymers; At least 55% maltitol, not more than 8% sorbitol, 60% sweetness vs. sucrose. 3kcal/gr (d.b.).
Up to 100% replacement of sucrose and corn syrup
Tailor made blend obtained from a mixture of sucrose and high maltose corn syrup.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering

Coarser particle size compared to MALTISWEET® CM100. Less expensive than MALTISWEET® CM9820.
Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free & reduced sugar applications.

Crystalline maltitol used as bulking agent in various sugar free, reduced sugar applications. 2.1 kcal/g. 90% as sweet as sucrose. Used to directly replace baker's special sugar. Humectant, Soluble in water, Sweetness profile very similar to sucrose.
Finer particle size compared to MALTISWEET® CM40. Because of smaller particle size, provides a smooth, less gritty mouthfeel.
Non-browning, Non-cariogenic, Tablet and/or capsule diluent, Primary bulking agent in sugar free & reduced sugar applications.

Crystalline maltitol used as bulking agent in various sugar free, reduced sugar applications. 2.1 kcal/g. 90% as sweet as sucrose. Used to replace powdered sugar. Humectant, Soluble in water, Sweetness profile very similar to sucrose.
Natural, non caloric HPS for sugar free/reduced sugar applications; clean, sweet taste at low conc., bitter/licorice flavor at higher conc., some sweetness lingering

Naturally occurring high potency sweetener extracted from the leaves of Stevia plant. Contains min 97% Reb A. About 200-300 times sweeter than sucrose.
A white to off-white crystalline powder. It is freely soluble in water, methanol, and alcohol. It is slightly soluble in ethyl acetate. It functions as a nonnutritive sweetener/flavor enhancer.
Non-caloric high potency sweetener. Good stability at high temperature, low pH, good solubility, clean, sweet taste with no significant unpleasant aftertaste. 600 times sweeter than sucrose.
Directly compressible sorbitol; cryoprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant and excipient.
Crystalline sorbitol with uniform particle size distribution

White crystalline powder, free flowing, cryroprotectant, crystallization inhibitor, freeze point depressant, plasticizer, humectant. Need to add HPS to achieve desired sweetness. Can withstand high temperatures without browning. Pleasant cooling effect.

Provides harder texture, simpler processing, reduced production time than sucrose in panning application.
Dry crystalline powder, free flowing, flavor enhancement; non-masking, highly fermentable, high osmolarity, high reducing capacity
High quality, general purpose crystalline monohydrate dextrose, DE>99.5

Penford equivalent for PERFECTAGEL™ AV-13. Enhancing chew/texture, alternative to higher cost gelatin ingredient.
Acid thinned modified potato starch. Favorable firm gelling and texturing properties. Bland in taste. Short texture and low hot viscosity. Forms firm gel.
Penford closest match for PERFECTAGEL™ MPT, but not equal. Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization.

Modified potato food starch with favorable gelling and texturizing properties. Good elasticity in gummy candy. Low hot viscosity and bland taste. Clear dispersion with long body and quick to set to a elastic firm gel. Suitable for partial gelatin replacement (up to 40% replacement).
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization.
Modified starch derived from tapioca. Adds moderate to a high degree of mouth coating and has slow meltaway, reminiscent of caramel type products.
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization.

Maltodextrin derived from tapioca. It enhances mouth-coating, creaminess, and provides good meltaway. It creates the visual appearance of being slightly coarse in texture, yet there is no graininess perception in the mouth.
Tapioca dextrin with excellent film-forming properties, coupled with low viscosity. Ideal for applications where good surface wetability is important.
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization.

Excellent solubility and provides smooth mouthfeel, clean meltdown and no sandiness even in high brix (high solids) fillings. Has exceptional stability. Hydrates easily and is suitable in systems where immediate water binding is required, i.e., gumming.
Hydrates easily when heated to > 75°C; very low hot viscosity; easy to process at high concentrations and/or in high solids systems.
Develops gels upon cooling which are shear thinning and have thermo-reversible properties. Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization.

Excellent solubility, provides smooth mouthfeel, clean meltdown and no sandiness even in high brix (high solids) fillings. Exceptional stability & film-forming properties. Provides good fat barrier properties.
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization, Fast gelling, For heat stability improvement, a vegetarian claim, excellent sheet, short, firm, and elastic texture.

Modified food starch (acid treated sago starch) specifically for rapid gelling. Easy to cook with the properties of low, hot viscosity and an elastic gel upon cooling. Can be used at higher starch solids than typical confectionery or native starches. Obtain gels of various degrees of firmness.

Fine mesh gellan gum that is a multifunctional gelling agent. It is ideal for a variety of gelling, texturizing, stabilizing and film forming applications. Helps to increase temperature resistance (< 50°C)
A carrageenan standarized with sucrose, and is used as a gelling agent.

Thin boiling starch refined from corn. It is recommended for use in food systems that require the properties of low hot viscosity and gelling from a starch. Clear, excellent sheen and a desirable stringy texture in jellies.
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization, Fast gelling, For heat stability improvement, a vegetarian claim, excellent sheet, short, firm, and elastic texture.

Modified food starch (acid treated sago starch) specifically for rapid gelling. Easy to cook with the properties of low, hot viscosity and an elastic gel upon cooling. Can be used at higher starch solids than typical confectionery or native starches. Obtain gels of various degrees of firmness.
Acid hydrolyzed dent corn providing gelled texture ranging from slightly soft to firm. More viscous than CANDYMIL 5061. Results in firmer candies compared to CANDYMIL 5061 at the same conditions.
Acid hydrolyzed dent corn providing gelled texture ranging from slightly soft to firm. Less viscous than CANDYMIL. Results in softer candies compared to CANDYMIL at the same conditions.
Penford equivalent for PERFECTAGEL™ AV-13. Enhancing chew/texture, alternative to higher cost gelatin ingredient.
Acid thinned modified potato starch. Favorable firm gelling and texturing properties. Bland in taste. Short texture and low hot viscosity. Forms firm gel.
Penford closest match for PERFECTAGEL™ MPT, but not equal. Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization.

Modified potato food starch with favorable gelling and texturizing properties. Good elasticity in gummy candy. Low hot viscosity and bland taste. Clear dispersion with long body and quick to set to a elastic firm gel. Suitable for partial gelatin replacement (up to 40% replacement).
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization, Fast gelling, For heat stability improvement, a vegetarian claim, excellent sheet, short, firm, and elastic texture.
Modified food starch (acid treated sago starch) that is easy to cook with the properties of low, hot viscosity and an elastic gel upon cooling.

Blend of acid hydrolyzed regular corn and acid hydrolyzed propylated Hylon 5 high amylose corn starch. Low hot viscosity, rapid set, more tender texture vs. HI-SET® 322, excellent shelf life, Very low hot viscosity to deposit at higher solids, reduced drying times, high gel strength.
Enhancing chew/texture, shape retention, prevention of sugar recrystallization, Fast gelling, For heat stability improvement, a vegetarian claim, excellent sheet, short, firm, and elastic texture.

Modified food starch (acid treated sago starch) specifically for rapid gelling. Easy to cook with the properties of low, hot viscosity and an elastic gel upon cooling. Can be used at higher starch solids than typical confectionery or native starches. Obtain gels of various degrees of firmness.
Usage level cannot be too high as TEXTRA® will impart cohesiveness to the sugar mass.
Modified tapioca starch (hydroxypropylayed). It is easily cooked with low hot viscosity.
Usage level tends to be higher than ELASTIGEL® 1000J or TEXTRA® in order to obtain the required firmness and structure.

PURITY GUM® 40 is a low viscosity product with little or no tendency to increase in viscosity upon cooling. It is more easily dispersed in water than gum arabic. However, it must be heated to 190°F (88°C) to fully cook the starch and achieve optimum solubility and application characteristics.
Suitable for extruded candy (fruit leather or licorice candy that is manufactured using extruder).

Clean label functional tapioca starch that is recommended for high temperature and shear food processing. It has excellent resistance to heat and shear, moderate resistance to acid, low hot viscosity.
Suitable for extruded candy (fruit leather or licorice candy that is manufactured using extruder).
Acetylated distarch phosphate tapioca starch that has excellent resistance to heat and shear. Has moderate resistance to acid. Has low hot viscosity.
PO-POCl3 treated corn starch. Reduced pillowing during cutting of extruded marshmallow.
Recommended to use in combination with ULTRA-SET LT. This product provides exceptional forming, texture, and structure at more efficient usage levels and in less time than comparable products.

Pre-gelatinised modified sago starch (distarch phosphate) that forms a firm, cuttable gel without heating. Fast gelling (setting) property in as little as 1hr. Gelling applications typically require a 3-7% usage level.
Recommended to use in combination with ADVANTA-GEL® S.
Modified corn starch (acid-treated). It is easy to cook with fast setting property.

Xantam gum that provides superior functionality in an 80 mesh format and is suitable for use in food preparations and personal care applications. Hydrates rapidly and compatible with high salt systems provideing flexibility and increased viscosity vs. traditional xanthan, and Viscosity agent.

Xantam gum that provides superior functionality in an 80 mesh format. Rapid hydration and compatibility with high salt systems, provides flexibility and increased viscosity vs. traditional xanthan, and viscosity agent. Also has pumping properties.
Exhibits excellent dispersibility and imparts superior sheen, clarity, and smoothness when compared to traditional pregelatinized starches.

High performance, agglomerated, cold water swelling (CWS) modified food starch derived from waxy maize. Thickener agent with extremely resistant to harsh processing conditions including intense heating (microwaving), high shear (milling), or low pH.
